lender.name: Kristoffer
lender.loan_because: I think people should have the opportunity to make a living doing something they like. I think the Kiva loan idea treats people with dignity and respect.
lender.occupational_info: I find homes for children that have been abused, neglected by parent, abandoned by parent, lost parent or need a home trained to meet their special needs.

lender.name: Niccol√≤ Ferragamo
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people who need help and want to work to achieve their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I study and work when I can!

lender.name: Timo R
lender.loan_because: I can, and I should.

lender.name: Raul
lender.loan_because: I would like to make a difference in a small way across boarders
lender.occupational_info: Satisfying and challenging

lender.name: Keith Forrester
lender.loan_because: I can choose specifically where best to direct my help.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the Coca-Cola system.

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: It's good for all of us.

lender.name: Jozsef
lender.occupational_info: I'm a project manager in Hungary, mostly managing software developemnt project. My family has a bakery at Ukraine, making really special, traditional BIO bread. My plan is to move or even open the bakery here at Hungary, let the people feel how our grandparents felt when they get a piece of traditional bread. This could be a big project what i can manage, and give back something to my family who gave up everything to let me come over and study here at Hungary.

lender.name: Lene P~
lender.loan_because: Kiva has made it so easy

lender.name: Finnegan & Family
lender.loan_because: We want to teach our child that he is connected to the world & that he can change it...even in small ways.
lender.occupational_info: We are just a little working family living in a big city. Big deals for us as a family include: Eating out @ our favourite TexMex, having a Friday night pint @ our local pub & just hanging out in general.

lender.name: Hector
lender.loan_because: It is time to give back. One at a time can also make a difference.

lender.name: Richard Middleton
lender.loan_because: I have known for years about Grameen Bank and the the amazing impact that microfinance can have on people who have no other access to credit. Congratulations to Kiva for taking this idea further.
lender.occupational_info: Before I retired, I spent about 35 years trying to help solve the problems of developing countries, especially the appalling lack of safe water and proper sanitation in villages and city slums.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: God has graced me with good health and happiness and it is my goal to help others experience the same in their lifetime.
lender.occupational_info: We own a marine dealership that sells and services boats and motors.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: It helps me to reconnect to a world that works very hard to disconnect.

lender.name: Molly
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of self-employed women to change the world for the better.

lender.name: Meghan
lender.occupation: Assistant to the Vice President, MSH

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I want to share my good fortune with others

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: Those of us who have so much are called to help others reach their dreams and goals.
lender.occupational_info: I teach keyboard music to retired adults and to young children. Before I retired I was a high school history, government and economics teacher.

lender.name: Caroline
lender.loan_because: I want to help keep the entreprenuerial spirit alive throughout the world and help ppl who are in need.

lender.name: Candice
lender.loan_because: Because I may only be able to help in a small way, but a little help from a lot of people adds up to some big help!
lender.occupational_info: I give walking tours in Savannah, Georgia's historic district. Usually ghost tours at night. :)

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: To share
lender.occupational_info: Office work

lender.name: Don & Lucy
lender.loan_because: we are so lucky to have the life that we have that to try to help in some small way is an honour.We think that kiva is a special place and will be spreading the word to all we know.

lender.name: Ray and Judy
lender.loan_because: God has blessed us so we want to bless others.

lender.name: William (Bill)
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. Disadvantaged communities are just that, disadvantaged and those of us who are not so disadvantaged have a responsibility to help.
lender.occupational_info: Helping organisations to 'do the right thing'.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: People deserve a chance to make a better life for themselves and their families regardless of where they are born.
lender.occupational_info:
I am a Program Manager at Health Canada, and I work with First Nations communities in environmental health.
From Jan - June 2010, I served as a Kiva Fellow working with four amazing Kiva Partners in Rwanda (Urwego Opportunity Bank), Democratic Republic of Congo (Hekima) and Tanzania (Tujijenge Tanzania and Yosefo).

lender.name: Zoraida
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference by being a blessing to other people.
lender.occupational_info: I direct my organization's Resource Mobilization Department which has the main tasks of fund sourcing and mobilizing.

lender.name: guillermo
lender.loan_because: If people are in need of something I can give them, I will. Every time. Always.
lender.occupational_info: I make video games.

lender.name: Kieran
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: kanan
lender.loan_because: Poverty breaks my heart and it is unacceptable and I sincerely believe that everyone needs to be given an opportunity to succeed and take care of their family.
lender.occupational_info: interesting and challenging

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I want to help people less fortunate than my family and I.

lender.name: Brenda
lender.loan_because: It gives me joy. I admire these people tremendously.
lender.occupational_info: For a living: sound recording on documentary films around the world and TV commercials in New York. For artistic and creative expression: Screenwriting & Audio Installation art involving language and human rights. (see website)

lender.name: Nathan
lender.loan_because: One cannot outdo God's generosity.
lender.occupational_info: Teach 6th Grade.

lender.name: Emma
lender.loan_because: I want to help people better their lives and communities.
lender.occupational_info: I find the problems in computer software and on websites so they can be fixed before the public sees them.

lender.name: Lauri
lender.loan_because: I¬¥m curious about how this system works...
lender.occupational_info: Graphic design, brochures, posters, websites, logos...you name it....

lender.name: m74
lender.loan_because: The world needs balance.

lender.name: Emmanuel
lender.loan_because: Empowering people to make it out of poverty through their own work is a very powerful idea, and I'm glad to help in a small way.
lender.occupational_info: I design and program the "Azada" casual games series at Big Fish Games, the leading casual games studio/distributor.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I want to maximise utility.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student of philosophy, intending ultimately to go into policy, research or development work.

lender.name: Niklas Backman
lender.loan_because: I have travelled the world and know that a small amount can help you.
lender.occupational_info: I work with internet, I design services for the public.

lender.name: Jake
lender.loan_because: I like to share my good fortune and I think that helping to empower other people to make their lives better is a great thing to do. Kiva Rocks!
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office and make downloadable computer games for Big Fish Games. The games are "casual" which means they are suitable for a wide audience, children and adults alike.

lender.name: Karl
lender.loan_because: 0% interest is a lot more than what my mutual funds make - about -50%/year :-(

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I love playing a small part in helping empower people to help themselves and their families.

lender.name: Atto
lender.loan_because: This is where we get to use the money from http://buildabeard.helloatto.com Hurrah!
lender.occupational_info: We think, then Do for great organisations who share our love for good ideas and design, honesty and transparency in business and making the world a bit better along the way.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.occupational_info: I am a primary school teacher in Australia.

lender.name: Antoine
lender.loan_because: I'd like to pay forward and help others get opportunity. May the economic activity which is being financed via Kiva, and the resulting enhanced earnings of the borrower's family, help in turn support initiatives locally (commercial or not) for a further ripple effect!

lender.name: elham
lender.loan_because: i think it's a great idea to connect people across the globe and to bypass the banking system.
lender.occupational_info: At the moment I'm researching the impact of floods on communities and individuals.

lender.name: Leila
lender.loan_because: We are all brothers and sister of one human race. I would help my close siblings if they needed it so kiva gives me a chance to help many of my brothers and sisters, no matter how distantly related.
lender.occupational_info: I look after my 3 small children and try to help others.

lender.name: Laurence
lender.loan_because: it provides opportunity while maintaining dignity in work and life.
lender.occupational_info: High School teacher at an international school.

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: helping people to help themselves makes more sense than simply donating....and these folks have already shown that they are capable of taking their lives in their own hands.
lender.occupational_info: there's different jobs I have - one is working part time at a McDonald's restaurant...plus I'm also self-employed running a one-woman office called "Scriptorium", where I do translations and word processing...

lender.name: Fernanda
lender.loan_because: I Still Care.

lender.name: rens
lender.loan_because: we live together
lender.occupational_info: I teach about mind and brains. I visit brainpatients

lender.name: charles durand
lender.loan_because: I think it is the best way to develop other conutries
lender.occupational_info: I am retired. From 1963 to 2002 I worked in French National Statistics (i.e. INSEE)

lender.name: colettas
lender.loan_because:
Our family has been blessed and now we are in a position to help others.
I believe in "paying it forward" and helping those who are willing/eager to help themselves.
Love all, serve all

lender.name: Virg√≠nia
lender.loan_because: I believe in a better world I care about others

lender.name: Marci
lender.loan_because: We as individuals have a duty to be good citizens, support good works and charities and be responsible not only to our own communites, but to the world community.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I would like to create several gainful jobs across the world using the web site platform we have built which is very easy to adapt and used. A registered person can help small business to create a web page and increase business and revenue. They can charge the business for their services.
lender.occupational_info: Our team in USA, India and Romania are creating all the technology and interface needed to create a web site for every village, city or town in any country. Anybody can request a website for their village and start maintaining it and add business pages and charge a small fee from the people they help to set up shop. They can also create community groups, network discuss various community matters relating to education, food, shelter, politics or any other subject.

lender.name: r√©mi
lender.loan_because: i think Microfinance is a very good tool to fight poverty

lender.name: Tom Grochowiak
lender.loan_because: It's a cool idea.
lender.occupational_info: I design downloadable computer games.

lender.name: Asuma
lender.loan_because: Everyone in this world should have the opportunity to set and achieve their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I go to a university here in San Francisco and i am studying international studies focussed in international economics

lender.name: Maupin
lender.loan_because: In this Youtube video, I like how, discovered, the chubby dancing guy yells and bolts out of the apartment:

lender.name: taho
lender.loan_because:
Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish and he can feed himself for a lifetime

lender.occupational_info: I help establish Christ-centered communities in the largest unreached urban areas of the world.

lender.loan_because: I can...

lender.loan_because: I have more then I need

lender.name: Marc, Natasa, Alan
lender.loan_because: We would like to do our bit as a family to help out other families.

lender.name: Anchal
lender.loan_because: I am not here with any thoughts of getting anything in return but just to help people in need. May be one day these people can help me. With little contributions, we can all make a huge difference towards the development of not just the people but the society as in Whole.
lender.occupational_info: I am a full time Database Developer/Consultant. I have graduated from Bach. of Technology program in Computer Systems. I'm also a part time Web Developer developing Website. I also take great interest in photography and capture nature as much as I can.

lender.name: Simon
lender.loan_because: I love.
lender.occupational_info: A scientist serving humanity.

lender.name: Eduardo
lender.loan_because: I know that working capital is needed for a business and its hard to get when you are small.

lender.occupational_info: I design websites, logos, business cards, letterheads, I also work with audio, video and photography...

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I make computer games for people to enjoy with friends and family across the world.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: A dear family friend got me started, and I am excited about the immediate and concrete difference this kind of investment can make in a person's life.
lender.occupational_info: I work on farms in different places in the US in exchange for knowledge about how to farm, food, and a place to sleep.

lender.name: Ignacio
lender.loan_because: I think this might actually work.

lender.name: Emilio
lender.loan_because: It doesn't charity, it's a way for people themselves building its future

lender.name: Bjorn A. Solstad

The descicion to start lending through Kiva is a way to give something back to the needing in less fortunate situations.

lender.occupational_info: I work as an engineer purchaser in a french company which creates sea-water desalination plants for the world market.

lender.name: Vezubuhle
lender.loan_because: I would like to help eradicate poverty. I am from a very poor background and i believe God has given me an opportunity to be in a position to help.
lender.occupational_info: I run a social network for Christians. In other words I try to help Christians meet other Christians on the internet from my website.

lender.name: Patrick

lender.name: Srini
lender.loan_because: I want to reduce, if not eliminate the gap between advanced / emerging economies and under-developed nations
lender.occupational_info: I work with companies to automate their manual processes and reduce inefficiencies

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Guadalupe Flores
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who help themselves. I want to help those who have a driving entrepeneurial spirit like me. Gustaria ayudar ellos quien se ayudan solos. Que trabajan con animo como yo.

lender.name: JACK
lender.loan_because: A SMALL LOAN A BIG START FOR LIFE
lender.occupational_info: SALES REP IN FRANCE FOR PHARMACEUTICAL INDUSTRY

lender.name: Lariat
lender.loan_because: Today I made my first loan to Iraq.
lender.occupational_info: Here's my other interest:http://www.seattleflyingdragons.org

lender.name: Tyler
lender.loan_because: God has given me too much not to help those who need it more than I do.

lender.name: Lia
lender.loan_because: You only get one ride on this roller coaster called "life" and I want mine to count for something.
lender.occupational_info: I help other people find easier ways to do their work.

lender.name: Roland
lender.loan_because: ... it's fun!
lender.occupational_info: I develop and verify software used in diesel engine control units.

lender.name: Jacob
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: When we help good organizations and businesses communicate by phone or internet we are also helping people and the environment.

lender.name: Pierce
lender.loan_because: Everyone in life deserves a chance to better themselves and their family.
lender.occupational_info: I provide customer service at a bank and am training to be a lender.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: rrr, out on the open seas there aren't many people for a pirate brain surgeon to operate on, so i need to make a difference somehow.
lender.occupational_info: i'm a doctor in new york city. while i work here to help people who are sick, i hope to also make a small difference in the lives of hard working people in resource poor settings.

lender.name: Steve
lender.occupational_info: I work with intellectual property.

lender.name: Lise
lender.loan_because: It's an easy and meaningful way to make a difference for someone in need, and to support local initiatives.

lender.name: Len
lender.loan_because: Helping others is something I have been taught by my parents. It not only helps pay back some of the blessings I've received but it makes me feel good.
lender.occupational_info: Analyze business operations and propose ways to improve the practice/organization. Since I retired, I now teach computers in the Community Senior Center, at the high school Adult Education, and at individual's homes.

lender.name: KivaKam
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: charles
lender.loan_because: egoism: it brings me personnal satisfaction
lender.occupational_info: helping companies to master IT

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: You today, me tomorrow.

lender.name: Jay
lender.loan_because: ‚ÄúIt is not enough to be compassionate; you must act. Compassion without action is merely wasted sympathy.‚Äù‚ÄîNobel Peace Prize Laureate, Jody Williams

lender.name: The Caswells
lender.loan_because: we love.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I am so blessed and so many all over the world are not.

lender.name: Dindayal
lender.loan_because: I feel good helping hard working people.

lender.name: Chuck
lender.loan_because: I care. To help make a difference. To help make the world a little bit better place.

lender.name: Bob & Gina
lender.loan_because: i am a business owner.

lender.name: RB & DB
lender.loan_because: We care about our fellow human beings. We pray for peace world wide, and want to help people help themselves. We are hopeful we will help give God a reason to continue to bless the USA, as well as the faithful worldwide.
lender.occupational_info: We are striving to reduce the amount of the world's energy we and our customers consume.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I think its a very small thing I can do to make someone's life better.

lender.name: Coby
lender.loan_because: The world needs a little less poverty and a lot more hope.

lender.name: Marilyn
lender.loan_because: I have traveled much of the world over the past several years and met some extraordinarily talented people who may not have been as financially blessed as me. I would love to see them have the same opportunities as I have had to create a brighter future.

lender.name: Alan
lender.loan_because: I think it's cool to help people, and in particular, I like to help people be self supporting and not dependent on handouts. That's not good for either the giver or the recipient.
lender.occupational_info: I help keep computers running that allow people to access the internet, and provide some of the services they use (email, web, etc).

lender.name: Ric & Robin
lender.loan_because: We want to help other small business owners because we know what it is like to work for yourself. Special people have been kind to us and loaned us money when we needed it so we want to do the same for someone else.
lender.occupational_info: Ric is part owner in a company that makes special effects devices for electric guitar players. Robin works for a major airline.

lender.name: Timothy
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.

lender.name: Ea
lender.loan_because: I feel that if I have some money I do not urgently need, I would rather lend it to someone who can put it to good use and make a change in her and her family's life.
lender.occupational_info: I just graduated from university where I studied business, leadership and strategy. I am now looking for a job.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.occupation: College Student at University of Florida

lender.name: Kirsten
lender.loan_because: It's awesome to be able to do something useful even though I don't have tons of money. It makes me happy.
lender.occupational_info: I'm in my 4th year of medical school, I'm going into Family Medicine to prevent and treat medical illnesses of babies, children, and adults of all ages.

lender.name: May Thria
lender.loan_because: it's our responsibility to take care and help each other

lender.name: Aimee
lender.loan_because: I truly believe in the life-changing effect of micro-credit programs. The way to a better world is through empowerment of communities!

lender.name: Rian
lender.loan_because: I feel the pain of those who struggles to make a living and survive through their business. Also because my mother owns a restaurant. She started by borrowing money too and was very successful in paying back the loan and getting the business up and running very well.
lender.occupational_info: I am doing my Master in International Development and I have a passion to travel and get involved with the community in developing countries. Take part in the world and lend every strength of my fiber to promote their welfare

lender.name: Marco
lender.loan_because: So little can go so far for people in need. This is a fantastic way to help people!!

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are willing to work hard to be successful. Best wishes!
lender.occupational_info: I am retired. I used to represent employees in school districts such as instructional assistants, bus drivers, maintenance and cafeteria workers, and secretaries.

lender.name: Michael

lender.name: Kristel

lender.name: Anne-Lise
lender.loan_because: For a better world!

lender.name: Nate
lender.loan_because:
I want to give others the opportunities in life that I have had. One way I can do this is through small donations which I hope will enable these individuals to prosper both personally and professionally.
I believe all it takes is one small step at a time from enough people to make a significant change in the world.

lender.name: EarthKind Solar, LLC
lender.loan_because: EarthKind Energy and EarthKind Solar have donated the remainder of it's returned loans ($461!!!!) to Kiva. It is a amazingly worthwhile project which helps small business owners across the world!

lender.name: Mr & Mrs. Kimble
lender.loan_because: We have so many blessings ... it takes so little to help others to feel so much joy.

lender.name: William

lender.name: Patti
lender.loan_because: It's a joy to give to others.
lender.occupational_info: I help people who are sick.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I think we should all help each other out on this earth. We are all connected in one way or another. If we helped each other out more, the world would probably be a better place. Be the change you want to see in the world!! :)
lender.occupational_info: I help keep my boss organized, prepared, and on time. I specialize in presentation preparation, and web page design. My job is forever changing. I also coach girls volleyball, and I teach piano to young children.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: It's fun.

lender.name: Jacqueline
lender.loan_because: I will like to buy some beauty products in order to sell them here in cameroon. Women like american beauty product s so much. lender.name: The School of Spanish
lender.loan_because: We want to make a real connection between what we are learning in class and what is going on in the world.
lender.occupational_info:
We are students of the Spanish language. These are the standards for foreign language learning that we hope to meet through KIVA:
COMMUNICATION Communicate in Languages Other Than English Standard 1.2: Students understand and interpret written and spoken language on a variety of topics
CULTURES Gain Knowledge and Understanding of Other Cultures Standard 2.1: Students demonstrate an understanding of the relationship between the practices and perspectives of the culture studied Standard 2.2: Students demonstrate an understanding of the relationship between the products and perspectives of the culture studied
CONNECTIONS Connect with Other Disciplines and Acquire Information Standard 3.1: Students reinforce and further their knowledge of other disciplines through the foreign language Standard 3.2: Students acquire information and recognize the distinctive viewpoints that are only available through the foreign language and its cultures
COMPARISONS Develop Insight into the Nature of Language and Culture Standard 4.2: Students demonstrate understanding of the concept of culture through comparisons of the cultures studied and their own.
COMMUNITIES Participate in Multilingual Communities at Home & Around the World Standard 5.1: Students use the language both within and beyond the school setting

lender.name: Anika

lender.name: Nyana
lender.loan_because: My parents each run their own businesses and I've seen how empowering it is for someone to be able to use their skills and talents in a way that isn't possible without taking a risk and going out on a limb. Running a business is a challenge I don't think I'll ever be up for, but I deeply respect and want to support those who are willing to invest their own talents in making dreams come true. I hope that by sharing a little of my savings, I can spread the wealth (what's wrong with that John McCain?).

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: I may need a loan someday.
lender.occupational_info: I create images and designs for those who want something quirky, fun, and unique.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to succeed in life. Like a sunflower seed, every idea has a germination process and during that stage it needs healthy fertile soil, refreshing water and the golden rays of the sun. I firmly believe that microloans can help grow and idea into a bright, sunny and successful business venture. It's an honor to have the opportunity to contribute to this process
lender.occupational_info: I paint sunflowers and sell sunflower craft products, I also do photography, write, volunteer my time to worthwhile projects, and teach art to students after school.
